creator: firoz.shaik@iflexsolutions.com
text:
When i am starting apache i am getting the following error.

ld.so.1: /projects/WWW/appsets/dev/www/apache/apache-1.3.37/bin/httpd: 
fatal: relocation error: file /projects/WWW/appsets/dev/www/apache/apache-
1.3.37/bin/httpd: symbol Perl_save_destructor_x: referenced symbol not found
Killed
/projects/WWW/appsets/dev/www/apache/apache-1.3.37/bin/apachectl start: httpd 
could not be started

Please help us on the same. I have searched the entire users group.I have not 
got solution for this.

This looks like a mod_perl issue. I suggest asking on the mod_perl mailing list
for further help.
creator: slive@apache.org
